title: What is literature in the pre-colonial period? - Quora

response.answer_text: So I specialise in Hong Kong history and in the pre colonial period before 1841 for HK Island , the Bigger clans wrote their histories Man Tang Pang Hau and Liu I presume all have them , there is a book that translates the best bits into English, But tends to be history not literature there are some pre colonial stone carvings Some are pre literate maybe they tell a story , one definitely has a parrot bird but they tend to be abstract the latter ones that we can read are legal
